snippet: The incoming prime minister, Bidzina Ivanishvili, said Tuesday that Georgia should participate in the 2014 Winter Olympics in the Russian resort of Sochi.
lead_paragraph: The incoming prime minister, Bidzina Ivanishvili, said Tuesday that Georgia should participate in the 2014 Winter Olympics in the Russian resort of Sochi.

headline.main: Georgia: Incoming Premier Favors Joining Russia Olympics
